name: Gillian'sHealthMinute
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With new posts daily Monday-Friday, Gillian Harris offers simple health advice for the body, mind, spirit, and relationships. Lovingly crafted and carefully produced, these 60-second features are heard on AM & FM radio, and internet stream. Gillian's content is well constructed and presented with her uniquely charming and vivacious personality. Topics include women's health, healthy tips, personal fulfillment, weight loss, spirituality, growth, achievement, advice, meditation, beauty tips, parenting, balance, and introspective awareness.

This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
